page.title: 13 AN OLD FARM
page.content: Barn farm is a beautiful old farmhouse on Heath Road in the village of Ramsden Heath. The farm was built in about{1450,}and most of it is as it was originally. The house was added in 1900. The farm is not used as a dairy farm any longer, having a stock of only 30 dry cows. During the 35 years the present owner has lived here, the farm has changed its purpose completely.Barn Farm is now a packing station for the egg marketing board. Eggs are brought here from all over the area to be checked, graded, and packed. Finally the cases of eggs are delivered to local shops. The farm is also a meeting place for some villagers. A weekly bridge club is held there, and every summer a village fete.
